name: Natural Disaster
description: A natural cataclysm such as a wildfire, devastating weather, earthquake, or flood (as determined by the GM) devastates your kingdom. While in a worst-case scenario the disasterâ€™s immediate and most destructive effects affect a single settlement, many of its effects are larger in scope and can affect the entire kingdom.

criticalSuccess.msg: You prepared well for the disaster. While disruptive, the damage is minimized.

success.msg: Your quick response keeps your people safe and allows you to recover quickly. During the next turn, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Lose 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

failure.msg: The disaster causes severe damage. Choose one claimed hex in which you have a Farmland or Work Site; that feature is destroyed. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="decay" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Decay</button> and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Gain 1d6 Unrest</button>. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="6">Lose 6 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

criticalFailure.msg: Multiple hexes are totally devastated. Choose [[/r 1d6]] claimed hexes in which you have Farmlands or Work Sites; those features are destroyed. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="decay" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="true" data-value="1">Gain 1 Decay</button> for each hex affected, and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2d6">Gain 2d6 Unrest</button>. In addition, one settlement of your choice is particularly hard hit; that settlement immediately suffers the effects of a Local Disaster. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="8">Lose 8 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>
